value:
$WmMPID_カイネギス,ch11_13_Caineghis_M_Normal,Face|I am Caineghis, King of Gallia
and the beast tribe.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Mother... I...$k$pI...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Eir.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Ah! Mother?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|So you have not yet perished, and
you remain with the Askrans.$k$pGood. Continue to ingratiate yourself.
Rely on them. Submit to them.$k$pThen, when I order it, kill them.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Mother... They... They treat me well.$k$pThey're so kind to me... Prince
Alfonse, $Nu...$k$pPlease... Forget all this... Let them
live.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|I have no interest in your wishes, Eir.
You have heard my order, and you
will obey it.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Mother... Ever since I have joined
them, I keep having the same dream...
A dream of the past...$k$pWhite wings... Warmth and life... You
smiled at me so gently.$k$pWhen... When was that?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|You will obey me, Eir.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I...$k$pYes, mother.$k$p$Sbs150|
